Accessed on 2008-07-02. | population_total = 482261 | population_as_of = 2008 | population_density_km2 = auto | population_demonym = | timezone1 = CET | utc_offset1 = +01 | iso_code = DZ-24 | area_code_type = Area Code | area_code = +213 (0) 37 | blank_name_sec1 = Districts | blank_info_sec1 = 10 | blank1_name_sec1 = Municipalities | blank1_info_sec1 = 34 | website = | footnotes = }} Guelma Province is a province in eastern Algeria. The name is from the largest city Guelma. There are 429,998 people who live here. ==Divisions== The province has 10 districts and 34 communes or municipalities.Journal Officiel de la République Algérienne, No. 41, Page 1307. 4 September 1991. ===Districts=== # Aïn Makhlouf # Bouchegouf # Guelaât Bou Sbaâ # Guelma # Hammam Debagh # Hammam N'Bails # Héliopolis # Houari Boumédienne # Khezaras # Oued Zenati ==References== Category:Provinces of Algeria
title: Guelma Province
